title: Modell's CEO Still Believes Shoppers Will Come to Stores
itunes:title: Modell's CEO Still Believes Shoppers Will Come to Stores
description:
Mitchell Modell, Chairman and CEO of Modell’s, says brick and mortar stores are still critical to purchasers of sporting goods. He says customers like in-store experiences such as trying on a baseball glove. He also talks about his efforts to attract investors.

Hosts: Carol Massar and Jason Kelly. Producer: Doni Holloway.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
